ai-patthana17.24:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.24:1.1_0: defiled influences, the skillful teaching doesn’t arise because of corrupt wishes.
ai-patthana17.24:2.1_0: nature gives rise to the skillful qualities, not corrupted by corruption or three. ...
ai-patthana17.24:3.1_0: While it is corrupted, the unskillful is not corrupted or corrupted, nor by the three unskillful.
